apis.description: List of all candidate acts (with per act the name, number of votes, date added)

parameters.name: minimumVotes
parameters.description: minimum number of votes that an act has to have received to appear in the list

parameters.name: addedSince
parameters.description: acts that have been added since this date

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: maximum number of acts that is returned

responseMessages.message: Returns one specific artist with all the associated details, including the discography

info.title: artistapi
info.description: The artists that can be fetched
